channel.title: What happens to deleted posts?
channel.description: I'm particularly interested if there's anything remaining of the old SCAR sections or of what was removed from the MoparScape boards during the Great Purges.

item.title: What happens to deleted posts?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Davidi2:

This also used to enable people to have 1000 pms

I can only imagine Silabsoft’s mood swings.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens to deleted posts?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:3, topic:420961”]I don’t know if you’re referring to the Archived Hidden Boards. You can enable them by joining a membergroup, I don’t remember.

Edit: Here, check it out http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;area=groupmembership;u=4656[/quote]This also used to enable people to have 1000 pms

[quote=“Aftermath, post:9, topic:420961”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=523636.msg3810915#msg3810915 date=1320894315]
Anyone can have access by following rix’s instructions.
[/quote]

I did that to see hidden boards, but I would also like to see the thrash board - the old MSCP topics were deleted rather than having their boards hidden and new ones made.[/quote]I think that’s staff-only: if a thread was deleted it was probably for a reason

Read full topic

item.title: What happens to deleted posts?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Aftermath, post:1, topic:420961”]I’m particularly interested if there’s anything remaining of the old SCAR sections or of what was removed from the MoparScape boards during the Great Purges.[/quote]Nothing of value was lost during the Great Purges.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens to deleted posts?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Any boards that are ‘deleted’ are simply moved to that archived hidden boards category, which is set to read-only.

Any posts or topics that are deleted are automatically moved to a ‘trash’ board, where only admins can delete from permanently.

Read full topic
